tool_description: This API returns a wide range of dad jokes. New jokes are added monthly.

api_list.name: /dad-jokes/joke-of-the-day
api_list.description: Returns the joke of the day. Each new UTC day, the API will return a new joke. During the UTC day, the API returns the same joke.

api_list.name: /dad-jokes/search
api_list.description: Search for a joke by a keyword. The keyword will be used as is in the search. The search is not case-sensitive and returns a maximum of 3 records per request.

optional_parameters.name: text
optional_parameters.description: 'text' query parameter is required and should be more than 3 characters long.

api_list.name: /dad-jokes/health
api_list.description: Returns the health status of the API, including the current UTC time.
